Reviews.Content: husband rome january 2012 city hotel wasnt hotel stay day shower sleeping ok sped day outside walking sightseeing shopping eating pasta pizza course soit choice spend lot money accommodation

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel for Budget Travelers”
Reviews.Author: mrosex3
Reviews.Content: spent 4 nights boyfriend anniversary studying abroad spain tight college student budget splurged tiny bit occasion bit worried reading reviews enjoyed stay hotel bought rome map termini station hotel stay easily found hotel maps provided checked quickly receptionist nice funny night tired dinner recommendation unfortunately restaurant suggested slightly disappointing oh breakfast nice loved chocolate cereal pitfall level street noise 3rd hotel staying italy 3 loud street noise wasnt surprised called front desk extra pillows fine level cleanliness fine beds comfortable 100 euro night ideal location near termini definitely deal

Reviews.Title: “friendly and convenient”
Reviews.Author: 2oldetravellers
Reviews.Content: third time five stayed hotel proximity termini station originally attracted friendly accommodating staff reasonable prices cleanliness compelled return occasion signs repair vents dirty raising concern air quality staff prices reasonable rome maintenance generous breakfast nice plus

Reviews.Title: “Reasonable price but nothing special. A very tiny room!”
Reviews.Author: NiinaE
Reviews.Content: staying rome week hotel basic tiny didn´t bother enjoy walking sleep hotel hotel walking distance main railway station termini rome little disappointment taxi driver overcharging didn´t cabs time start holiday food ok definitely someday kids sights i´ll staying hotel

Reviews.Title: “Basic Hotel Within 30mins Walk to Most of the Sights”
Reviews.Author: finchyboy
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights april 2011 paid £90 bb night hotel located 10 minute walk north termini station terravision bus transfer ciampino airport termini 8 euro return walked hotel checkin quick gentleman reception spoke english hotel located opposite embassy 1st floor balcony overlooked embassy gardens road unfortunately hotel located busy corner bit loud continuous road noise day little en suite clean found bed firm comfortable breakfast basic continental fare cereal yoghurt toast ham cheese croissants fine metro station 510 minute walk hotel walked tourist sites vatican 30 minute walk hotel metro value 1euro trip 4euro day pass id stay hotel cheaper alternatives rome tourist tax 2 euro night person paid check cash restaurants near tourists traps hideously expensive half cost meal simply walk hundred metres crowds watch cover charge restaurants cafes apply bill charge directly pay bread serve start meal 10 arent eat bread send

Reviews.Title: “Good value 3 star hotel in quiet area”
Reviews.Author: pjay00
Reviews.Content: returned fantastic 5 day visit rome pleased hotel despite previous reviews found reception staff pleasant helpful 3rd floor fairly spacious fridge containing reasonably priced drinks bed comfortable plenty hot water shower towels changed day continental breakfast plentiful continuously replenished fresh croissants lovely reasonably priced bar reception serving coffee drinks lounge easy chairs safety deposit box day hotel opposite british embassy 30 minute stroll colosseum walked bus stop outside hotel main train station 10 minute walk metro bus stations free map reception handy restaurants close hotel tried standard reasonably priced pleasant trip stay

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay here!!”
Reviews.Author: rhondamckane
Reviews.Content: damp walls stains lampshades smell sewage coming drains bathroom photos totally misrepresent true hotel complained staff offered leave hotel ruined trip heed review similar experience

Reviews.Title: “AWFUL!!! DAMP, SMELLY AND RUDE STAFF”
Reviews.Author: Jackie4712
Reviews.Content: people leave bad reviews hard please left review trust dont book hotel description mould wall bathroom musty smelt sewage breakfast pitiful complained receptionist identical explained move else rude unhelpful refused refund payment hotel close called marcella royal little bit extra superior hotel

Reviews.Title: “Not the best budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: fowlerclan
Reviews.Content: looking budget based central location clean nice breakfast hotel fairly location walk sights staff friendly hotel extreamly smelly smoke carpets grubby dirty stains bed linen dirty blankets near skin wallpaper material absorbing smells shower cubical cracked pubic hair people bathrooms incrediably sit sit toilet shower mini bar thats call bottles water previous occupier filled water tap mini bar lift quirky fashioned film laughed breakfast dissapointing cereal cold meats cheeses bread roll dry packets crispy french toast course fruit juices tea coffee choice pallets toaster bread hungary hotel tired looking shame lovely hotel centrally based budget quality below budget definatly stay base sleep spending time sleep breakfast shame spoil stay

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Brasile: Budget Hotel at best”
Reviews.Author: travelcityguy
Reviews.Content: staff hotel fabulous helpful showers etc budget rome hit experience return hotel based stay smelled smoke shower cold unimpressed hotel bed worst slept entire time europe breakfast poor quality street significant superior quality coffee pastry

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay at Hotel Brasile”
Reviews.Author: AAF254
Reviews.Content: husband decided holiday rome wedding anniversary booked accomodation hotel website helpful booked transport airport hotel tidy maids nice whats thank staff unique experience stay rome

Reviews.Title: “Very good central hotel”
Reviews.Author: FrankKehler
Reviews.Content: ive spend recently 5 days holiday rome wife weve choosen hotel central location front british embassy vicinity public transport subway station 5 minutes walking distance historical centre attractions via veneto spanish steps etc 1520 minutes walking distance hotel nice 3 stars services properly nice quiet third floor facing internal courtyard perfect clean bed comfortable towels etc changed day dinner restaurant hotel twice theres plenty nice cosy lunch dinner excursions city catch metro termini station hotel staff helpful organise daytrip naples overall holiday rome worth visit definetely recommend hotel value money

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for money !!”
Reviews.Author: Pancho_50
Reviews.Content: staff pleasant helpfull helpfull clean comfortable sized bed towels etc changed day toilet dont cat hotel located close termini close nice restaurants cafes bit noisy traffic bad 1520min walk centre taxis etc available locally breakfast selection fruit cereals rolls pastries yogurts fruit juice coffee tea sets day pleasant 4 night stay yes
